name: TAIPEI METRO QUEST
description:
TAIPEI METRO QUEST

<3 a short narrative game about time-traveling home <3

an ode to taipei, lost friends and my former selves

my first bitsy game! would love feedback!

acknowledgements:

  • thank you so much to everyone who play-tested!!!!!
  • this game was inspired by all the incredible bitsy games about memory and nostalgia, especially Under A Star Called Sun by cecile richard and Vaporwave Vision Quest: Kmart Sepulcher by Lvl 14 Bard
  • this game is the output of a Humanities Passion Project supported by the Gould Center!
